mapper.insert: insert into award (award_id, create_time, update_time, deleted, project_name, award_name, award_level, award_time, award_rank, user_id, file_id) values (#{awardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{awardRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update award
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award_name = #{awardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award_level = #{awardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award_time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
award_rank = #{awardRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where award_id = #{awardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update award set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award_name = #{awardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award_level = #{awardLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award_time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, award_rank = #{awardRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where award_id = #{awardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT award.award_id, award.award_level, award.award_name, award.award_rank, award.award_time, award.file_id, award.project_name, f.url FROM award JOIN filepath AS f ON f.file_id = award.file_id where award.user_id=#{user_id}
